ygData.subject: Re: Starting out
ygData.msgSnippet: Bow Cams you ll want to sell to boyers, and there arent a lot of those (at least I ve never sold many).  They re a fairly hard item to push.  Fireworks I
ygData.messageBody:
Bow Cams you'll want to sell to boyers, and there arent a lot of those (at
least I've never sold many). They're a fairly hard item to push. Fireworks
I personally give away to gain a client base... people generally remember
them and will ask you what other toys you have, and this is where I show
them the stalking probe. Since you're a gnome you start out such that many
items are already trivial (fishpole, fireworks, ect), and stalking probes
can recompense <some> of your money, but dont expect to sell many. They're
toys for rich people, which in essence is what all tinkered items are. Its
too bad that we cant get any items that everyone WANTS to have, like
virtually every other trade (platinum ruby vail, vodka, trushot longbow,
handmade backpack, ect).... the rebreather hardly qualifies. A good fellow
gnome named Yugi I often see selling telescopes for 100 plat per pop... he
tells me this is working fine for him, and anyone that says 'thats too much'
he tells them simply that it is a toy for those who can afford it, and those
that cannot can do without.

Personally, I"m to generous with my tinkered items... I find them so
wonderful I have to give them to all my friends!

Cogg - Rallos Zek

----- Original Message -----
From: James Adams <jwa@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2000 5:13 AM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Starting out


> From: "James Adams" <jwa@...>
>
> First off I want to say how great it is that there ARE other gnomes out
> there who take such an avid interest in one of the few things that set us
> apart in Gnorrath. Having followed your adventures and attempts at
> discovering the lost knowledge of tinkering has kept me going...and now I
am
> ready to start working as well.
> A few questions though....
> I already know what to make as I progress, but I'm curious...how do you
sell
> the items you make (ie fireworks, cams, etc?) I really doubt anyone would
> buy a flameless lantern, and I don't blame them, but what about other
items?
> I have successfully made some cams and can't seem to sell them. Nor
> fireworks, which I have heard are a hit...which makes me feel useless
since
> I can't get rid of them.
> Any advice would be appreciated, and since I don't know of any other
gnomes
> tinkering on my world this was the only place I knew to ask. Of course,
if
> there is another one out there that'd be great...
>
> Phizn Frugin
> MithMarr
>
>
